1: Are utz na ri uxic meba' tz'akatisanel c'ut pa ronojel, che u q'uexwäch ri man c'o ta u no'j ri banal tzij tal.
2: Man utz ta ri elem ch'u'j we man c'o ch'obonic; ri sibalaj e aninakil quequic'am ulok q'ui tak sachinakil.
3: Ri u conil ri winak cuban che chi cusach ri be, cuyaxtaj c'ut ri winak ri chak'maquil chrij ri Ajawaxel.
4: Ri k'inomal quebuc'am ulok q'uialaj tak achil, are' c'u ri meba' quebutzak c'u ne na tak ri rachil.
5: Ri u cawäch k'alajisanel kas curik wi na ri c'äjisabal u wäch; ri banal tzij man quel ta puwi' ri cubano.
6: Ri sipanel man co ta c'u ranima', catzucux cumal conojel ri winak cux c'u cachil.
7: We ri meba' xukuje' ne tak ri e rachalal caquetzelaj u wäch, c'o ba ne rumal ri' quenajtin ri e rachil che.
8: Ri curik etamanic cuchaplej c'u u banic ri retamam, cuya' u k'ij chbil rib capok'colij c'ut.
9: Ri u cawäch k'alajisanel kas curik wi na ri c'äjisabal u wäch; ri banal tzij queyex rumal ri cämical.
10: Man ya'tal ta che ri man c'o ta u no'j chi cäc'oji' pa k'inomal, mawi ya'tal ta che ri lok'om pataninel cuk'at ta tzij paquiwi' ajawib ri nimak qui k'ij.
11: Ri utzalaj no'jinic are ri u k'ilic ri oyowal, are c'u ri u ya'ic k'ij, man c'o ta cubij u c'u'x che ri il patan.
12: Ri royowal ri ajawinel xak junam ruc' ri u wunic ri coj, are c'u ri utzalaj u rayibal jacha' ri räxk'ab puwi' ri k'ayes.
13: Jun c'ojolaxel ri man c'o ta u no'j cuc'axc'obisaj ri u tat. Ri ixok ri xak cäch'ojinic xak junam ruc' ri tz'uj ri man cätani' taj.
14: Chque ri nan tat quec'am wi tak ja xukuje' tak k'inomal; ri ixokilaxel c'oxomanel cäc'am che ri Ajawaxel.
15: Ri sak'oril cuya' nimalaj waram, are' c'u ri sak'or cucoch' na numic.
16: Ri cutz'akatisaj u banic ri takomal cuto' u wi' ri u c'aslemal; ri man nim ta cäril wi ri u tijonic ri Ajawaxel, cäcämic.
17: Jun jalomal che ri meba' jun jalomal wa' che ri Ajawaxel, kas are c'u ri Ajawaxel cätojow na ri c'asaj.
18: Chajic'a' ri a c'ojol utz c'ä cuya' cäjiq'uic, macämisaj c'u rumal ri u c'äjisaxic u wäch.
19: Ri sibalaj coyowaric cuc'am na ri takal che; we quesax chuwäch ri c'äjisabal wächaj xa canimatajisax ri jasach.
20: Chaya' a xiquin che ri no'j ri cäya' chawe chac'amowaj c'ut ri pixbenic we je caban wa' catux na ajno'j.
21: Ri winak quebuban q'ui tak chomanic, are c'u ri u chomam u banic ri Ajawaxel are cabantajic.
22: Ri sibalaj cucämisaj wi rib ri winak che u rayixic cux u quiäkasakil; are' utz na ri meba' chuwäch ri banal tzij.
23: Ri u ya'ic u k'ij ri Ajawaxel cäc'aman bic pa ri c'aslemal; cac'oji' jun pa quicotemal man c'o ta c'u jun lawaloyil cäpe puwi'.
24: Ri sak'or cunim ri u k'ab pa ri liq'uilic lak, mawi c'u ne cäticaric cuc'am bic cuya' pa u chi'.
25: Che ri u c'äjisaxic u wäch ri banal nimal, ri con quetamanic; ri ajno'j quetamam xak xuwi ruc' ri pixbenic.
26: Ri u banic c'ax che ri tataxel xukuje' ri resaxic bic ri nanaxel pa ri ja, esbal tak q'uixbal wa' xukuje' e u q'ueyowal che jun alc'ualaxel.
27: Nu c'ojol, we man catoc il che ri k'iloj ib catas na awib chquij ri utzalaj tak yo'w no'j.
28: Ri u cawäch k'alajisanel cäretz'bej u wäch ri suq'uilal; ri banal etzelal quebutzak ulok etzelal pa u chi'.
29: Xak e c'o ri xic'ay chque ri e banal tak nimal; ri utzalaj tak rapubal che ri uwo rachak ri man c'o ta u no'j.
